description: Improve System Design review with GitHub-style code diff UX and merged graph mode, and publish fresh dev comparison artifacts.

changes.description: add GitHub-style System Design file diff viewer and merged graph mode

details.summary_simple: System Design diff now shows side-by-side red/green code changes with expandable fullscreen review, plus merged graph mode.
details.risk_notes: Diff API route is dev-server middleware; restart local dev server if route is not available.

changes.description: publish latest System Design artifacts for dev compare

details.summary_simple: Published updated snapshot and diff artifacts for comparing current dev System Design state.
